name: Sisyphus and the Pumpkin
description:
Help Sisyphus to push the pumpkin to the top of the moutain in a minimum time ! But take care of the obstacles on the road !


___________________________________

          Controls :
Left/Right to move
Up/Down to speed up/down
Space to skip cinematics
